comment.body: I guess it has nothing to do with the code but many songs with 1 peers cannot actually be downloaded :( (Take Linkin Park Meteora album for instance, everything but the first song has one peer but cannot listen anything). Too bad, I would like to seed some, will retry later, appreciate the idea of ZeroLSTN :)
Related : The movie "Hidden figures" about the "computers" which were back then women assigned to mathematical/computing tasks for the NASA in the 60's
@styromaniac@zeroid.bit: The movie really is about NASA (the space agency), although I guess the NSA used its share of womans as well :)
